ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure
Class Tile

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
AudioTile, PhotoTile, TextTile, VideoTile
public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract tile class that will be implemented to provide text, audio, video, and picture tiles. A tile is the fundemental unit of a page; they are aggregated by Page and displayed vertically in ViewPageActivity. Tiles are part of the model of the application and are serialized and stored with a Story by a Handler implementation
